title: WTB/WTTF: T205 Doc White with Polar Bear back
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T205 Doc White with Polar Bear back
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I'm looking to buy or trade for a T205 Doc White with a Polar Bear back.  I'm mainly looking for low to mid-grade but will consider anything you have.  Also possibly interested in this card in any condition with other tough backs.  I'm willing to buy for a reasonable price and I also have a 300+ card tradelist as well.  Please e-mail with any offers.  Thanks very much.
